name: Gotteskoog
author: Daniel Zwick
body:
Historie

The wreck was discovered during dredging operations in 1961.

Beschrijving

The wreck seemed to be comparable to the logboat from the Lecker Au in terms of construction and age.

Lengte36 voet (11 m)

Status

It was destroyed in situ with no documentation.

Referenties

  • Kühn, H.-J. (1999).
    Gestrandet bei Uelvesbüll - Wrackarchäologie in Nordfriesland.
    Husum.
